snippet: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts is teaming up with Chesapeake Energy to invest in oil and natural gas projects in the United States, the latest move by private equity in the lucrative energy sector.
abstract: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts is teaming up with Chesapeake Energy to invest in oil and natural gas projects in the United States, the latest move by private equity in the lucrative energy sector.

headline.main: K.K.R. and Chesapeake Energy Form $250 Million Partnership
